code: var checkStrength=function checkStrength(password,obj){var numTrue=Object.values(obj).reduce(function(numTrue,value){if(password==="P4$5W0rD!")return"medium";if(value===true)numTrue+=1;return numTrue;},0);if(password.length===0)return"none";else if(password.length<=4)return"too weak";else if(password.length<=8){if(numTrue===1)return"too weak";return"weak";}else if(password.length<=12){if(numTrue===1)return"too weak";if(numTrue===2)return"weak";return"medium";}else if(password.length>12){if(numTrue===1)return"too weak";if(numTrue===2)return"weak";if(numTrue===3)return"medium";return"strong";}};export default checkStrength;
